answers.answer: Hi!The twitching in one half of face could be due to could be due to injury to a nerve or pinched nerve, an infection or a trauma. Hence it could be Trigeminal neuralgia, abscess in tooth, exposed root canal of a tooth, internal ear infection, maxillary sinusitis, TMJ, migraine, herpes (recurrent) without rash or fibromyalgia localized to face. Do discuss this with your son’s doctor. Treatment will follow diagnosis.
